name: Sheep Race
description:
Sheep race is, as the name would suggest, a game about racing as a sheep! 

It is a split screen racing game featuring things such as rolling sheep, powerups and gravity flipping! Currently the game contains one map that you can race through with a fellow sheep, two power ups in the form of a fireball to throw at your opponent and a deployable mine! 

Unfortunately the controls for player two are not displaying correctly so the correct controls for player two are: 

  • Movement: Arrow Keys
  • Use Powerup: Right Shift 
  • Flip Gravity: Right Control 

We hope you enjoy our little game!
